price: 33 Ou alors diront-ils qu’il l’a inventé ! C’est qu’en vérité ils s’obstinent dans leur impiété.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
